https://tmrev.io/movie/564549-Closing Gambit: 1978 Korchnoi versus Karpov and the Kremlin 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/x0ZnODbZHMWvgfghexS0SNi48Az.jpg The story of the 1978 World Chess Championship between the Soviet Communist Party's protege, Anatoly Karpov and the traitor and Soviet defector, Viktor Korchnoi. One of those instances in life where truth is stranger than fiction. Closing Gambit: 1978 Korchnoi versus Karpov and the Kremlin
